news.title: After Harvey hit, one Texas nursing home evacuation began with a gun drawn

news.title: Why Some People Choose to Shelter In Place
news.summary: Several days after Category 5 Hurricane Irma blew through the Caribbean and Florida in September 2017, more than a half-dozen seniors died in a steamy hot Florida nursing home when the air conditioning failed due to lack of power.
